item.description:
We will be hosting a traditional game night at Damata's Pizza in Salem.

The food is great, as are the prices. (We do request at Meetups held at service venues that each person attending at least order one item: food or beverage.)

There is also plenty of free parking. Should you be coming from outside of Salem, just remember that Damata's is on Bridge St., not the Bridge St. Bypass.

Please bring your favorite board game to play.

Should you need to contact us the night of the event, you can reach us by cell phone: 508-740-3683.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night at Damata's
